No. 234206)} Sub: Amendment to Policy Circular No: 10.2.34/2024 dated 10th January 2024 regarding "SOP to improve Authority Engineer's/ Independent Engineer's/ Supervision Consultant's performance and better Contract Administration In reference to above Policy Circular dated 1Oth January 2024- Section 5, Clause 5.5, to ensure Comprehensive Monitoring and Successful Completion of the Projects, it has been decided that additional follow-up Meetings beyond AD+5 months shall be conducted as per the schedule appended as Annexure-A All these Meetings shall be conducted at RO/PD, CGM and Member level jointly with Contractor/ Concessionaire, AE/IE and DPR Consultant (if required). 2 The monthly follow-up meetings shall be chaired by RO (PD if RO is absent). The Agenda of the Meeting shall be as per the Standard Format of Kick-off Meeting with emphasis on: (a) Status of Physical and Financial Progress of the Project: (b) Hindrances and Delays in the Project and reasons for delay (if any).  (c) Proposal for Extension of Time (if any). (d) Support required from the Authority (if any). (e) Corrective Measures to expedite the progress. (f) Status of Design and Drawings and pending permits and licenses (if any). (g) GAD approval from Railways, Irrigation Department, Defense, AAI etc: (if any): h) Status of Utility Shifting: Status of Land Handover. If required, the monthly follow-up Meetings shall be followed-up by the site inspection by Project Director-NHAI and the site inspection shall be done in presence of Project Manager of Contractor Concessionaire, Team Leader and Personnel of AE IE: 3 In-addition to the above, the periodical follow-up Meetings shall also be conducted at NHAI-HQ level on following dates: Schedule date of Milestone-2 Scheduled date of Milestone-3 One month prior to the PCOD and Schedule Completion Date COD Contd__2I- M T 7 @ NHAL 18th reg: Key
